message: I propose a 90/10 split. It's a fair starting point, and I believe we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
I propose a 90/10 split in my favor. This reflects the higher rate of inflation impacting me. I believe this is a fair starting point, and I am open to negotiation.
I understand the inflation has affected you more, but a 90/10 split in your favor is too steep.  Let's compromise with an 85/15 split.  I'm willing to negotiate further if necessary.
